title: Need some help
content:
Hello everyone..   
I'm having a bit of trouble and need some help. I was using trade gothic to layout my magazine, but it became overused by other magazines with the same theme. I was looking for type that woks the same, or a type that has a thin stem and reads well.   
I thak you all..
author: alex_f_h

comments.content: Alex, some questions: What kind of magazine? Do you have a budget in mind, or did you want opinions on faces in your existing library?

The magazine talks about how to live life in a simple way, with gardening, catering and dressing tips. It has a very clean design, with lots o white. There for the type to be used needs to be very light and thin. There is no budget in mind....yet :-)

Alex did you by any chance look at any Font Bureau fonts like Hermes. They make very good publication fonts. The other Foundry to check out is Terminal Design, their Giacomo and Clearview are beauties.
Thank you very much....I'll do some experiments with these fonts. You were right, they are beaties... :-)
